attributes.action: either pay some attention to the vast number of people who communicate their dissatisfaction with government policy by signing these e petitions or to admit they are just a spin led sham like so much of New Labour. We further demand that the government show any instance where the overwhelming public disapproval of it's polices as expressed in an e-petition, has ever influenced it's actions.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: This e-petition system is a complete sham.  It is cynically designed to let people think this government cares what it's citizens think when in fact, they palpably don't. They have decided that "Nanny knows best" and will continue to ride rough shod over our desires and demands. It is high time that the Prime Minister remembered that he may be running thing but he does so on behalf of his employer the Great British Public.
